title: System Analysis and Design Comprehensive Exam (Randomized Version)

questions.question: The process businesses use to analyze sales data, automate processes, and optimize workflows is called:

questions.answer: The entire system that collects, processes, stores, and shares information

options: Ensure technology is used effectively and securely
questions.answer: Ensure technology is used effectively and securely

questions.answer: Systems that can learn, predict, and make decisions

questions.answer: Planning, creating, testing, and implementing information systems

questions.answer: Break down problems into smaller parts

questions.answer: A bridge between the business side and the technical side

questions.question: Which of the following best describes cloud computing?
options: Running programs only on local devices
Storing data and applications online instead of on physical servers
questions.answer: Storing data and applications online instead of on physical servers

questions.question: Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) are systems that can:

A group of websites on the internet
Devices like phones and appliances that are connected and communicate online
questions.answer: Devices like phones and appliances that are connected and communicate online

questions.question: Which of the following is not an information system component?
Hardware is described as:
options: The programs that run on a computer
The physical layer of an information system
questions.answer: The physical layer of an information system

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of hardware?
Software can be described as:
options: The physical devices of a system
What tells the hardware what to do
The people who use the system
questions.answer: What tells the hardware what to do

questions.question: What does system software do?
options: Manages hardware and basic computer functions
questions.answer: Manages hardware and basic computer functions

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of application software?

options: An older system still in use
questions.answer: An older system still in use

options: The tasks and workflows that achieve results
The people who use the system

questions.question: Who are considered stakeholders in an information system?
options: Anyone who has an interest in the system
questions.answer: Anyone who has an interest in the system

questions.question: What is the difference between users and stakeholders?
options: Users create hardware, stakeholders use software
Stakeholders manage, while users interact with the system daily
Users are external to the company
questions.answer: Stakeholders manage, while users interact with the system daily
